column1: The 1st to 3rd Respondents have exceeded the terms of their powers and mandates set out in
the respective Extraordinary Gazette Notifications marked as "P-10(A)" and "P-10(B)", inquire

column2: findings  and  make  recommendations  against  the  Petitioner.  The  said

column1: Extraordinary  Gazette  Notifications  clearly  set  out  the  powers  that  are  conferred  on  the
Commission,  and  it  is  clear  and  indisputable  the  Commission  is  not  empowered  with  the
power to make decisions with regard to the course of action that is to be taken against the
Petitioner and the other Respondents named in the Report.
